titleInfo.title: M. S. Freeman and Rockwell Potter correspondence, 1933 October

mods.abstract: Letter from Mrs. M. S. Freeman to Mrs. Martin enclosing a letter from Rockwell Potter, the President of the American Board of Commissions for Foreign Missions, appointing Mr. and Mrs. Freeman and Dr. William W. Peck to represent the Board at the commemoration of the Brainerd Mission cemetery.

subject.topic: American Board of Commissioners for Foreign Missions

titleInfo.title: Brainerd Mission Cemetery correspondence and research notes, 1896-1964
Brainerd Mission research notes, correspondence, and other material, 1896-1990
Penelope Johnson Allen papers
Special Collections
Penelope Johnson Allen Brainerd Mission correspondence and photographs
